item.title: Alleged iPhone 17 Pro Chassis Offers First Look at All-Aluminum Body
item.description: An alleged iPhone 17 Pro production line leak today offers a first look at the device’s milled all-aluminum chassis, which this year includes the camera bump – in contrast to last year’s iPhone 16 Pro

item.title: iPhone 17 Air Battery Allegedly 2.49mm – Half the Thickness of 17 Pro's
item.description: The iPhone 17 Air internal battery pack is just 2.49mm thick and appears to be about half as thin as the iPhone 17 Pro battery, based on new information and images coming out of Korea. Image allegedly
